author: rajith
msg: Modified the script to adapt to changes made by Alan in brokertest.py
The testkit can now receive and handle errors published by the JMS sender or receiver via an error queue.
For example if the test detects and out of order message it will notify the test framework and it will use that information to throw an exception with the captured java stack trace.

author: asrabkin
msg: CHUKWA-418. Standardize logging. Mark adaptor IDs.

author: rajith
msg: Modified the script to use absoulte paths when creating the classpath as relative paths could create issues when running the script in automated build environments.
